blocky-bubbles.options.animations.toolti: Whether the bubble column textures should be animated (requires asset reload).
blocky-bubbles.options.opaque_faces.tool: Whether bubble columns should render with completely opaque faces.
blocky-bubbles.options.quality.tooltip: Controls the quality of bubble columns.
blocky-bubbles.options.top_face_culling_: Which blocks should cause top bubble column faces to cull.
